Last Release Date: 24/02/2011

Current Release Date: 3 March 2011

This report covers 2011-02-24 to 2011-03-03

Code Changes From CVS/GIT Repositories


ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: fix stupid/bad bug in gaps parsing code causing it to fail unpredictably.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapView.h: remove unused struct from select return struct.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWindow.h: add new call to register remote client + new remote return code to select.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapXRemote.h: add new return codes for client errors etc. to send codes.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControl.c: remove unused code.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: sendcommand now returns a proper send response code.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: add code to register remote client existence with all zmapWindows
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteSend.c: add code to return proper send response code.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView_P.h: send command now returns proper send response code.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowFeatureShow.c, zmapWindow_P.h: xremote calls now return proper send response codes, calls now handle timeout from client.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2011_02_24.shtml
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.4850/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h, zmapFeature/zmapFeature.c, zmapFeature/zmapFeatureData.c: move locus to transcript, only needed there.
  • src/: zmapGFF/zmapGFF2Dumper.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTranscriptFeature.c: locus moved to transcript.
  • src/: zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowTextPositioner.c: locus moved to transcript.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow_P.h: formatting only.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowSearch.c, zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: fix up search stuff for locus for now...temporary until havana come back with requirements.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: formatting only.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowItemHash.c, zmapWindowList.c, zmapWindowNavigator.c, zmapWindowNavigatorMenus.c: fix up search stuff for locus for now...temporary until havana come back with requirements.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowNavigatorMenus.c: somehow an earlier commit was messed up by me, redo the code changes.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: forgot to copy xremote state to split window.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowMenus.c, zmapWindow_P.h: add option for non-alignment feature blixem.
  • src/: zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeature.c: allow user to click on non-align col/features to launch blixem, some annotators like to look at dna that way.
  • src/zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c: Fixed logging of stderr from pipe servers
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: fixed non terminating pipe servers
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapCmdLineArgs.h, libzmapfoocanvas/foo-canvas.c, zmapUtils/zmapCmdLineArgs.c, zmapUtils/zmapCmdLineArgs_P.h, zmapView/zmapView_P.h, zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemHash.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowList.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowMenus.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCanvasItem.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.h: fixed window list out of data item and feature data plus unmasked selected features (RT205744)
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: fix coord ordering for pasting of align coords.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS

Seqtools Changes/Fixes [from git]
  • Browse CVS
  • Added the ability to specify column widths in the config file
  • Also fixed a bug with the dynamic column width not being calculated correctly (it was not ignoring columns whose data is not loaded).
  • Made Source column sortable and reverted its width to 85 pixels
  • Added Source column to mouse-over feedback text
  • Enable Source column by default and make it narrow
